attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Jeremy Clarkson, is without a doubt a rare thing in the cotton wool clouded, carbon-zero Britannia we all live in these days.  The fine fellow that he is, may be most noted for telling it how it is- but without question he is the truest and most supportive of all voices when it comes to the British Motoring Industry.  

High time this top fellow receive a top award!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
